light.text1: <html><head><meta charset="UTF-8"><title>Linux Info</title><link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Product+Sans&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"><style>html, body {margin: 0;padding: 10px 10px 150px 10px;background: transparent;font-family: 'Product Sans', sans-serif;font-size: 14px;font-weight: 300;line-height: 1.6;color: #333333;overflow-y: scroll;-ms-overflow-style: none;scrollbar-width: none;}html::-webkit-scrollbar,body::-webkit-scrollbar {display: none;}body {max-width: 800px;margin: 0 auto;}h1, h2, h3 {font-weight: 700;color: inherit;line-height: 1.4;}h1 {font-size: 20px;margin-bottom: 16px;}h2 {font-size: 20px;margin-top: 32px;margin-bottom: 12px;}h3 {font-size: 20px;margin-top: 24px;margin-bottom: 8px;}p {margin-bottom: 16px;}ul {padding-left: 20px;margin-bottom: 16px;}li {margin-bottom: 8px;}strong {font-weight: 600;}em {font-style: italic;}</style>
light.text2: <html><head><meta charset="UTF-8"><title>Linux Info</title><link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Product+Sans&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"><style>html, body {margin: 0;padding: 10px 10px 150px 10px;background: transparent;font-family: 'Product Sans', sans-serif;font-size: 16px;font-weight: 300;line-height: 1.7;color: #333333;overflow-y: scroll;-ms-overflow-style: none;scrollbar-width: none;}html::-webkit-scrollbar,body::-webkit-scrollbar {display: none;}body {max-width: 800px;margin: 0 auto;}h1, h2, h3 {font-weight: 700;color: inherit;line-height: 1.4;}h1 {font-size: 24px;margin-bottom: 16px;}h2 {font-size: 24px;margin-top: 32px;margin-bottom: 12px;}h3 {font-size: 24px;margin-top: 24px;margin-bottom: 8px;}p {margin-bottom: 16px;}ul {padding-left: 20px;margin-bottom: 16px;}li {margin-bottom: 8px;}strong {font-weight: 600;}em {font-style: italic;}</style>
light.text3: <html><head><meta charset="UTF-8"><title>Linux Info</title><link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Product+Sans&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"><style>html, body {margin: 0;padding: 10px 10px 150px 10px;background: transparent;font-family: 'Product Sans', sans-serif;font-size: 18px;font-weight: 300;line-height: 1.8;color: #333333;overflow-y: scroll;-ms-overflow-style: none;scrollbar-width: none;}html::-webkit-scrollbar,body::-webkit-scrollbar {display: none;}body {max-width: 800px;margin: 0 auto;}h1, h2, h3 {font-weight: 700;color: inherit;line-height: 1.4;}h1 {font-size: 26px;margin-bottom: 16px;}h2 {font-size: 26px;margin-top: 32px;margin-bottom: 12px;}h3 {font-size: 26px;margin-top: 24px;margin-bottom: 8px;}p {margin-bottom: 16px;}ul {padding-left: 20px;margin-bottom: 16px;}li {margin-bottom: 8px;}strong {font-weight: 600;}em {font-style: italic;}</style>
